alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 2:44PM EDT until September 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... West central Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florida A and M, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Chaires, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, and Governors Square Mall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
